passwordCriteria: {{ field }} Have at least (one uppercase letter ,one lowercase letter, one number, one special character from the set @$!%*#?&)
noRepeatCharacters: {{ field }} must not contain repeating characters
noCommonWords: {{ field }} must not contain common words
exist: This {{ field }} is already in use
loginErrorEmailNotExist: The {{ field }} address you entered does not exist.
loginErrorWrongPassword: The {{ field }} you entered is incorrect.
letterSpace: {{ field }} must contain only letters and spaces
min: {{ field }} must be at least {{ count }} characters long
userName: {{ field }}  should contain at least 6 characters and should only include letters and numbers.
licenseNumber: License number should be exactly 9 digits
phoneNumber: {{ field }} must start with 73/77/71 and have 7 number after it
